title: league of legends you've been disconnected from new service please reconnect manually

replies.body:
This issue often occurs if your connection to the servers is poor. I'd recommend ensuring all of your local network settings are compatible with League by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). This will go over the most common settings that conflict with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
